text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO Lol 😆 Nancy, @POTUS @realDonaldTrump has made correct decision to pull out of @WHO which is a globalist mismanaged organization. WHO regarding #Covid19 was late & wrong w their recommendations on #COVID19. #Trump's travel ban & border wall saved 100s of thousands of lives. @VP
